name: Wrath of Nightmare
overview: Wrath of Nightmare is an adventure-puzzle game for the original GameBoy and desktop developed by Jordan Allen. It tells the tale of an enkian named Orpheus who receives a vision from his god tasking him with putting an end to the murders in his village of Vandros. As Orpheus you must use your wits to find who is behind the killings and navigate your village and it's surrounding areas.
